Posts.Content: Aug 18, 2016 03:50PM cocoapuff wrote: Gigicat, I had a negative biopsy and then an MRI was ordered.  The radiologist explained it was because the negative biopsy didn't explain my symptoms.  I am very glad they ordered the MRI because they found ILC, IDC and DCIS that was there all along.  It was costly and I had to pay for it, but not as costly as not finding this early enough would have been in my opinion.
Posts.Title: An MRI After a negative biopsy? Is it really necessary? Gigicat marie5890
